text: NASCAR 98 is a racing simulator video game developed by Stormfront Studios, published by EA Sports. It was released in 1997 for Sony PlayStation and Sega Saturn. This was the first game in the EA Sports NASCAR series. ==Reception== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1997 video games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:Racing simulators Category:Racing video games Category:Sega Saturn games
title: NASCAR 98
